title: cant connect to chat
body: after i did a match last night at 12 am, it wont connect to chat anymore, what should i do?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

We're currently investigating the issue. MuffyKing [made a post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?comment=0004) regarding this issue, and how you can provide more info to help us get to the bottom of this. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PNFozlQ9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-04T18:21:27.961+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> We're currently investigating the issue. MuffyKing [made a post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?comment=0004) regarding this issue, and how you can provide more info to help us get to the bottom of this. :]

I've been doing some research on the issue (It has occurred in the past) and many of the people affected have Comcast/Xfinity as their ISP if that helps at all.
